headline: Jim Jordan: ‘Every Single Right that We Enjoy under the First Amendment Has Been Assaulted’
sentences:
‘I still remember Jen Psaki standing at the lectern in the White House saying, “We are working with these social media platforms to limit the information Americans get to see.”‘
EXCERPT:
JORDAN: "Yeah, I mean, I hear about it from constituents all the time, we travel, we hear about from Americans across the country.

Your right to assemble, I always use the example, about a year ago I spoke to the New Mexico Republican Party in Amarillo, Texas because they had to go to Texas to get their freedom to assemble because their Democratic governor wouldn’t let them get together in their own darn state.”
You think about that, I maybe said this the other day, but every single right we enjoy under the First Amendment has been assaulted over the last year.
Until a few months ago, there were still some locations in the country where full congregation couldn’t meet on a Sunday morning.
